bug.author: ashish-hacker
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Problem location</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/wiki/SummerOfCodeIdeas>link</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h4>Description of problem</denchmark-h>
It's a typo. It should be "In recent" rather than "Inr ecent". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54330052/104442248-d02fbe80-55ba-11eb-901e-6a5127c7d75a.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: You are absolutely right, fixed, thanks.
Btw. nice picture is that you in the helicopter?
I wish it's mine, But it's not haha. It's a random pic from internet, I liked the view of the pic and also it's kinda reminds me of GitHub (Feels weird?) haha. Btw glad you also liked it.
Btw why is this issue still open? I am looking at the codebase of mlpack and beginner friendly issues to start collaborating : )

I wish it's mine, But it's not haha. It's a random pic from internet, I liked the view of the pic and also it's kinda reminds me of GitHub (Feels weird?) haha. Btw glad you also liked it.
Yeah, the picture is really nice.
I am looking at the codebase of mlpack and beginner friendly issues to start collaborating : )
Nice, let us know if there is anything we can help with.
Btw why is this issue still open?
No reason, closing it now.
